description:
Word 2010 is a word processor that allows you to create various types of documents such as letters, papers, flyers, and faxes. Used by more than 91% of Word processing users worldwide, never before has the need to understand basic document creation been more required.

Microsoft Word is a word-processing application that can be part of the Microsoft Office suite or a stand-alone program installed on to your computer. More than any other thing, Word allows effective communications within organizations and educational based organizations.

Word offers increased communications among senior leadership, middle management as well as front line staff members.

Here are areas students will improve skills in by taking our course;

1. Intro to Ribbon Functionality

2. Text and Formatting best practices

3. Tables and Hyperlink usage

4. Inserting Headers and Footers

5. Working with Shapes

6. Professional Page Layout

7. Report and eBook Cover Design

as well as several other areas!
title: Microsoft Word 2010 for Beginners
